snippet: MIGLIUOLO--Dagmar, (nee Zlatohlavkova) (10 April 1927 - 8 May 2016) wife of Giovanni Migliuolo (1927-1989) former Ambassador of Italy to the United Nations, Egypt and the USSR. Longtime resident of New York, she peacefully passed into grace in Turin, Italy. She leaves her children and their spouses (Andrea and Laura, Anna and Marialaura, Michele and Gina, Stefano and Sarah), grandchildren (Adriana, Alessandro, Giancarlo, Sebastian and Vittorio). Tenacious archaeologist, traveler, voracious reader and fluent in multiple languages, she dedicated herself to service in the Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center. Her friends are invited to join in the celebration of her life at the Church of St. Ignatius of Loyola (Park Ave and 84th St., New York City) at 10am on 29 June 2016. Burial will follow at the Gate of Heaven Cemetery (Hawthorne, NY), where Dagmar (Zlatohlavkova) Migliuolo will be laid to rest with her husband in this world and the next. 1/3
